9 107 42 4 9 3 36 22 5 25 29 128 161 205 134 393 383 514 355 232 69 54 190 10 (1) 4 27 30 28 36 81 (23) 90 (26) 72 38 38 35 181 37 349 2,180 608 3,174 3 37 346 386 20 363 178 561 37 352 2,217 954 3,560 87 1,532 6,238 2,290 10,152 569 398 586 424 351 171 128 294 29 262 1,897 6,898 2,921 12,007 396 391 509 433 112 70 55 31 21 22 21 21 30 28 35 35 10 7 6 417 413 530 454 142 68 301 4,758 1,997 7,124 19 19 5 139 158 297 1 10 (7) 5 506 90 601 89 89 74 36 68 301 4,897 2,155 7,421 104 130 128 151 36 35 35 12 10 138 1,678 2,150 606 4,572 1 28 30 63 15 22 15 269 11 81 443 535 2 6 1 12 7 11 421 245 25 413 705 1,143 105 158 158 214 51 57 27 279 138 1,689 2,231 1,049 5,107 522 571 688 668 193 146 101 315 206 1,990 7,128 3,204 12,528 836 802 937 964 466 525 391 630 310 1,085 3,240 9,400 5,551 19,586   ## p. 634 (#658) ############################################    ## p. 635 (#659) ############################################  Appendix 12 Combat Sorties Flown, Europe December 1941 to August 1945 ETO MTO Total 1941 Dec 1942 Jan Feb Mar Apr 1 May Jun 70 70 Jul 166 166 Aug 324 255 579 Sep 423 576 999 Oct 534 1,519 2,053 Nov 629 2,544 3,173 Dec 543 2,166 2,709 Total 1942 2,453 7,296 9,749 1943 Jan 767 4,330 5,097 Feb 976 3,362 4,338 Mar 1,564 6,478 8,042 Apr 989 12,963 13,952 May 3,915 12,724 16,639 Jun 4,104 13,248 17,352 Jul 5,531 24,370 29,901 Aug 5,826 21,532 27,358 Sep 9,294 20,659 29,953 Oct 7,463 14,124 21,587 Nov Dec Total 1943 9,624 15,856 25,480 13,876 19,948 33,824 63,929 169,594 233,523 1944 Jan Feb Mar May Jun 96,096 33,947 15,183 28,992 44,175 24,425 20,568 44,913 31,950 24,798 56,748 Apr 43,434 30,645 74,079 67,979 42,539 110,518 130,043 Jul 74,878 33,987 108,865 Aug 77,976 37,968 Sep Oct 57,384 26,359 52,596 22,607 75,203 115,944 83,743 Nov Dec 52,299 61,089 26,055 78,354 28,347 89,436 Total 1944 655,289 356,812 1,012,101 1945 Jan 47,477 16,914 64,491 Feb 68,365 31,348 99,713 Mar 111,472 35,408 146,880 Apr 79,402 41,495 120,897 May 5,565 646 6,211 Jun Jul Aug Total 19
